Package org.youscope.uielements

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CellSelectionTable.CellSelectionListener
    Listener which is called when cell gets selected or unselected.
    CellSelectionTableConfiguration  
    ImagePanel.LineListener
    Listener which gets informed about a currently drawn line in the image.
    ImagePanel.PixelListener
    Listener which gets informed about the currently hovered pixel in the image.
    TaskConfigurationListener
    Listener which gets notified if a task definition is finished.

    UI element to select a channel and channel group.

    A panel where the user can define a set of device settings.

    A panel simplifying with a grid bag layout simplifying to handle it.
    FocusField
    UI element to select a focus device and focus adjustment delay.
    GlassPane
    Glasspane to overlay a frame.
    HistogramPlot
    A plot showing a histogram.
    ImageLoadingTools
    Set of tools to simplify image loading.
    ImagePanel
    Easy to use resizeable panel to display an image.
    ImagePanel.LineInfo
    Information about a drawn line in the image.
    ImagePanel.PixelInfo
    Information about a pixel in the image.
    IntegerTextField  
    JobsDefinitionPanel
    Panel allowing the user to add, edit and delete jobs to a list of jobs.
    LinkLabel
    A label which looks like a link and fires ActionEvents.
    LiveStreamPanel
    A panel to configure, start and stop a live stream.
    LiveStreamPanel.ChannelControl
    Control to select the channel and exposure times.
    PeriodField
    Field which allows to define a period in any unit.
    PeriodVaryingPanel  
    SingleComponentDefinitionPanel<C extends Configuration>
    Panel to select exactly one configuration of a list of supported configurations, and to configure this configuration.
    StandardFormats  
    StateButton
    A component consisting of a label at the left and a little square at the right, being either red (deactivated) or green (activated).
    SubConfigurationPanel<C extends Configuration>
    A configuration panel allowing to choose between all configurations of a given type, and then to configure this configuration.
    TaskConfigurationPanel
    A window to edit tasks.
    TasksDefinitionPanel
    Panel which allows the user to add, remove and edit tasks of e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeUnit
    Enumeration of typical units used to measure time in YouScope, and their conversion to milliseconds.
